mapper.select: select ab_id abId , ab_name abName , ab_email abEmail , ab_comdept abComdept , ab_birth abBirth , ab_tel abTel , ab_memo abMemo from addrbook
mapper.insert: insert into addrbook(ab_name, ab_email, ab_comdept, ab_birth, ab_tel, ab_memo) values(#{abName}, #{abEmail}, #{abComdept}, #{abBirth}, #{abTel}, #{abMemo})
